name: Jumping Ball (DV08games)
description:
Jump over obstacles and beat 15 levels! They are not so easy.

When you finish a level, the next one will be unlocked.

Tip: If you hold jump, it may be a little longer.

PLAY THIS GAME ONLINE:

Liluo: https://liluo.io/dv08games/jumping-ball

On android devices the game works better if you download it.

CONTROLS:

JUMP - Touch right side of the screen

ENJOY THE GAME!
